titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Penn CAJS: RAR MS 82.313.1.1: Judeo-Arabic treatise on anatomy

notesStmt.note: Fols. from a medical treatise, including paragraphs on the back, hand and kidneys (fol. 1), rib cage (fol. 2), and nose (fol. 3). The title, or subject, of each paragraph appears as an incipit in enlarged characters, or in the margin. Arabic diacritic signs are provided when necessary. Torn, losses towards bottom; corrosive ink.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library). Cairo Genizah Collection (Dropsie College. Library).
